info.title: OGC Testbed 14 EOC - Transactional Web Processing Service 2.0 with Billing and Quotation - REST/JSON Extension API
info.description: This is the Transactional Web Processing Service 2.0 with Billing and Quotation REST/JSON Extension API developped in the frame of the OGC Testbed 14 EOC. This work is based on the WPS REST binding (https://github.com/opengeospatial/wps-rest-binding) by Benjamin Proß with updates from Patrick Jacques (Spacebel), Jerome Gasperi (Geomatys), Christophe Noël (Spacebel) and Panagiotis (Peter) A. Vretanos (CubeWerx).

get.description: The landing page provides links to the API definition, the Conformance statements and the metadata about the processes offered by this API

404.description: The process with id {id} does not exist.

get.summary: Retrieve the list of jobs for a process.

200.description: A list of jobs for this process.

404.description: The process with id {id} does not exist.

Location.description: URL to check the status of the execution/job.

404.description: The process with id {id} does not exist.

get.summary: Retrieve the status of a job

404.description: The process with id {id} or the job with id {jobID} does not exist.
The process with id {id} or the job with id {jobID} does not exist.

get.summary: Retrieve the result(s) of a job

404.description: The process with id {id} or the job with id {jobID} does not exist.

500.description: An exception happened during the execution of the job.

get.summary: Retrieve the list of quotation ids for a given process.

200.description: A list of quotation ids for this process.

404.description: The process with id {id} does not exist.

post.summary: Request a quotation for a given process.

404.description: The process with id {id} does not exist.
The process with id {id} or the quotation with id {quotationID} does not exist.

Location.description: URL to check the status of the execution/job.

404.description: The process with id {id} or the quotation with id {quotationID} does not exist.

get.summary: Retrieve the visibility status for a process.

200.description: The visibility status (public or private) for this process.

404.description: The process with id {id} does not exist.

put.summary: Change the visibility status for a process.

404.description: The process with id {id} does not exist.

get.summary: Retrieve the list of all quotation ids.

200.description: A list of quotation ids for all server processes.

404.description: The quotation with id {quotationID} does not exist.

Location.description: URL to check the status of the execution/job.

404.description: The quotation with id {quotationID} does not exist.

get.summary: Retrieve the list of all bills ids.

404.description: The bill with id {billID} does not exist.

get.summary: information about standards that this API conforms to
get.description: list all requirements classes specified in a standard (e.g., WPS REST/JSON Binding Core) that the server conforms to

200.description: the URIs of all requirements classes supported by the server

description.description: A description of what the quotation is related

processId.description: The id of the parent process

expire.description: The date and time (ISO 8601 format) when the quotation will expire

created.description: The date and time (ISO 8601 format) when the quotation was created

userId.description: User id that requested this quotation

estimatedTime.description: The estimated duration for the process to be performed (in ISO 8601 duration format)

description.description: The description of what the quotation is related to

expire.description: The date and time (ISO 8601 format) when the quotation will expire

created.description: The date and time (ISO 8601 format) when the quotation was created

estimatedTime.description: The estimated duration for the process to be performed (in ISO 8601 duration format)

description.description: A description of what is charged

created.description: The date and time (ISO 8601 format) when the bill was created

userId.description: User id that is charged for this bill

quotationId.description: Reference to the quotation id corresponding to this bill
